ygData.subject: RE: Umm Twinking Still
ygData.msgSnippet: Wear it, its not cheating.  You earnt it :-) -Faras Hmm, I wonder why every female wood-elf my level is in full steel and I am still in full bronze? heh...
ygData.messageBody:
Wear it, its not cheating. You earnt it :-)

-Faras

Hmm, I wonder why every female wood-elf my level is in full steel and I am
still in full bronze? heh...



> -----Original Message-----
> From: shinara@... [mailto:shinara@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 5:34 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Umm Twinking Still
>
>
> From: shinara@...
>
> I will probably regret sending this mail .. Please remember
> this is my first mail list and I have only been playing EQ
> for about 2 months now, so many of these comcepts are still
> new to me (Twinking, Item Camping, farming ??). I have read
> the Glossary so I understand the meaning if not the concept.
>
> Last night I was hunting in Crushbone and was grouped with a
> very high level player, I did not understand the EXP share
> problem. He just asked me to keep singing my heal song and he
> would look after me, I grouped with him for several hours and
> didnt get any exp. Anyway when I asked him about this he said
> he would fix me up for my time. After a further hour I told
> him I needed exp and would move on, at that point he said he
> had some stuff for me and initiated a trade. I asked my
> friend via tell if I should accept and he said yes as I earnt
> it. The Wiz gave me a Charred Chitchin Breastplate and a pair
> of Blackened Iron Pants. I asked my friend if they were good
> (I could see via AC and Stats they were, but how good?) he
> said they were, too good for my level. I have banked them for
> now and wanted to ask the list if I should wear them/sell
> them or give them away. I have no problem with twinking but
> dont want to be called a cheat. So please no flames just an
> opinion on what I should!
> do.
>
> Oh do all men like giving women stuff in EQ ?
>
> Regards
> Nina
>
